mention.text: a raid by US forces on a Baghdad mosque
The UN special representative in Iraq , Ashraf Qazi
Christian Science Monitor reporter Jill Carroll
Lieutenant-Colonel Barry Johnson , speaking of the abduction Saturday of Christian Science Monitor reporter Jill Carroll
Carroll , 28 , a freelance reporter working for the Christian Science Monitor
the kidnapping of a US reporter
